Title: [L-01] No way to get ETH out of proxy
Content: The proxy pattern used implements a `receive() payable` method (can be seen [here](https://github.com/Vectorized/solady/blob/2cfa231273fea6872c7cb70acfa134d2199aa7ea/src/utils/LibClone.sol#L337-L349)), but there is no way to get the received ETH out of the proxy, as the implementation contract that it `delegatecall`s to (`WERC721`) does not have a method to withdraw ETH out of it. Since the proxy is not expected to receive ETH this is not a High Impact issue, but it can still be worth it to add a `withdrawETH` method.
